info.task: navigate forwards to collapsed select-only combobox
info.title: Navigate forwards to a collapsed select-only combobox

setupScript.name: moveFocusBeforeCombobox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the Combobox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link before the Combobox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#beforelink').focus();

user: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Right) multiple times to hear all information relating to the combobox.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Right) multiple times to hear all information relating to the combobox.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Text of the selected option ('Choose a Fruit') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
